title: Device Help (previously Moto Help)
description:
Device Help provides you a whole product life cycle service experience, including Learn, Moto Care, Device diagnosis, Repair service and Contact us. 

Features:

• Learn – How to use phone and fix issues

• Moto Care – Check device warranty status, buy extended warranty and accident protection (US only)

• Device diagnosis – Check operation of hardware components, including battery, touch screen, speakers, cameras, Wi-Fi, and sensors

• Contact us – Options for contacting Support, including chat (some models only), email (some models only), Twitter, Messenger (India, US only), and to access user forums (English, Spanish, and Portuguese)

• Service center – Search the service center near you (India only)

• Service center – Search the service center near you (India only)

comments: I love this phone it's a very nice phone and it has an all day battery life and even more, the Moto help center has helped me out alot. I. Love the phone and would recommend it to anyone who has problems with phone's that die quickly and the camera is really good on it too. All in all a great phone and easy to use and the help center has given me some great insight.

Most recent update causing my phone to make a rapid clicking sound when on lock screen. I factory reset and went through each pre-installed app, disabling them one by one and the noise stopped when I disabled this app
Everything is fine but their is a problem after Android 10 update pubg and other game is not playing in full screen. Please resolve this issue. Motorola one action.
Easy to use, many useful tips the most complete support applicatuon of any phone I have owned previously. Excellent.
This app makes you wait 60 days before you can borrow $. If I had 60 days I wouldn't be trying to get $ from them uninstalled!

title: TalkLife - Lonely, Stressed or Battling Anxiety?
description:
If you're struggling you can get support right now! TalkLife connects you with real people around the world who want to listen and support you. No judgement. Just support! Let's talk! 

Life isn't always smooth sailing, but you're not alone! At TalkLife you can instantly meet supportive people who actually care and want to listen!  Share what's on your mind and get the help you need today! Meet new friends who really get you, You're not alone!

At TalkLife, we’re here for the moments when you just need a friend and some advice! We have a large community receiving support across anxiety, depression, eating disorders and those battling self harm. 

If you're battling with mental health, perhaps even struggling with self harm it can feel lonely, It can suck, and let’s admit it: that’s tough to say out loud. We all know that, and maybe, sometimes, we’ve just been made to feel a little afraid to say it. TalkLife is here for everyone and anyone who just needs someone to talk to. Who just needs someone to listen. Because, hey, we all do. 

So get on TalkLife and talk to people going through the exact same struggles you are. We know that sometimes it’s sort of hard to talk about certain things with family or even friends. This is a safe place where you can talk about anything: mental health, depression, self harm, eating disorders, a bad breakup or a relationship, school or work...it doesn’t matter. If you want to talk about it, someone else, does too. No judgments. No bullying. Just people who get you. 

Look, we made TalkLife because we wanted to create a community where you can always feel welcome and know that someone is here for you. Literally thousands of people are always on TalkLife-- at any time -- just waiting to listen. We think that’s pretty cool. Sometimes, life’s too darn hard to go through alone. We’d all feel a little better if we just felt safe and heard. So come join us and Download TalkLife for free today and make right now and everything after it a little bit better. Let’s talk and figure this life thing out together. 

Share life’s ups and downs 
• Talk about life’s struggles in a safe and supportive environment. No bullies here. And we’re silly serious about that.
• Help new friends out by sharing tips and advice from your own experiences. It’s amazing how helpful you can be to someone out there, whether you ever knew it or not.  
• Open up or post anonymously – it’s totally up to you. However you want to talk? We let you do it just that way.

Get involved with a community of thousands of people just like you
• Personally chat with or send gifts to other TalkLife users you find common ground with.
• Read and comment on interesting and inspirational content from the TalkLife blog. We honestly wanna hear from you!

comments: very helpful it's not like most "mental health" apps where they pretty much beg and pray for money it's seems like that generally care about you and your mental health as well as for others. You will get ads here and there but there not excessive ads. I really to suggest you download this app, it's the best mental health app out there and it's not a scam like the others.
love it, great app and makes you feel less alone, as advertised. ads are at a minimum and theres subjects for everyone to talk about. great privacy controls! overall 5 stars deserved 👏

This is one magnificent app. Truely it is! I have been using it for a while and it's a great way to blog, share your thoughts, connect with other people from different part of the world to he friends or vent out. You can filter the age with is a plus. It is very easy to use and navigating through it is quite comfortable. Overall i think it is really good 😊

It is a good app, lovely community and rather helpful. But if you install it help instantly, you have to post and comment a few times to be allowed to privately talk. You can get help, give help, it is still very nice honestly. Some of the profile settings were strange. Messages you a bit too much, like if you comment on someones post, you will be notified of any other comments on that post. And other times you won't get any notifications.

This is probably one of the best apps for talking and blogging so far. Being able to filter age is an AMAZING feature, so now I can talk and meet people my actual age. The only thing I dislike is the lack of profile individuality. I really dislike having to pay to be able to change my profile background at least. Also chatrooms. Idk if this is because I'm newer, but there is only like 8 and they are dead. Over all great app.

title: Helpify: need help? get local help and help others
description:
Helpify is a social movement through which we hope to cultivate a habit of being more helpful in people.
We are fundamentally a geo location based social network, where a user can come to the platform and ask for local help and help reaches them through their nearby users.
Helpify comes with integrated revolutionary emergency service.
4 clicks of power button and help will reach you in 5 minutes through nearby Helpify users and professional emergency services.

By helping others on the platform, you earn Karma which gets listed on our leaderboard and converts into real money on 23rd May.

Share the app with your friends and bring them in your Karma Network.
Earn Life long through good deeds your network does on our platform, as 20 percent of their Karma gets added on to your score as well.

title: Relationship Advice & Help: Emotional Support Free
description:
Olymp is a social app that helps to find new solutions in difficult 😓 psychological situations (relationship advice, marriage issues: divorce or breakup). Get real ❤ emotions and have an 🎯 advice from other app users in a common or private way. All stories, comments and messages are FREE and ANONYMOUS.

WHO AM I?
I'm the only developer, the founder and the author of the project Olymp.
https://instagram.com/star.ivanov
https://vk.com/star.ivanov

WHAT?
• 📩 Leave anonymously your story
• 🎓 Сhoose anonymously the best advice or opinion from users or experts
• 🎁 Get anonymous supportive messages privately from those who want it completely free of charge

WHY?
➤ 💬 You can talk out or discuss anonymously with other members of community your situation or talk privately with those who are willing to hear out
➤ ☹ Feeling depression or anxiety, lonely or stress because of divorce, break up or troubles in marriage, relationship or lost love - leave anonymously your sadness here
➤ 💔 If you are sad being unliked - try this app to skip these problems: give anonymously someone a little ⛵ get more tomorrow 👑

DETAILS
Sometimes in life circumstances come that we do not expect and it seems that I should be where in another place at another time but no - I'm here right now. Meet lonely. It is at such moments that you want to turn into someone, do something incredible and find a secret in the hidden treasure chest of life. You can go to therapy or talk with friends, girlfriends, but not always for this there are forces. So I made this application, which is easy to install and it's easy to give something to another simply by clicking on the button. And if the forces suddenly wake up the worried heart, you can write your story, stress or depression. Give it to the world as a boring game, look at what happens through the prism of human emotional responses and amazing tips. From the point of view of a specialist, a look at the situation in all manifestations is called awareness of the situation. This is far from a magic pill, this is the first step in order to recognize some aspects and make, start planning life anew, on coals of not simple situations.

Are you an aspiring psychologist? Your direction is psychology, psych, psychotherapy in the field of cognitive-behavioral therapy, positive therapy, Gestalt therapy? Then try to help people here! Emotional intelligence develops by realizing emotions and giving them place.

*You can write story in room only English but you can use any languages in private chat
**If you feel *uicidal or high anxiety - please ask for help for therapists; there are no people in app to handle these so risky cases.

THEORY
Emotional self-regulation or regulation of emotion is the ability to respond to the ongoing demands of experience with the range of emotions in a manner that is socially tolerable and sufficiently flexible to permit spontaneous reactions as well as the ability to delay spontaneous reactions as needed. It can also be defined as extrinsic and intrinsic processes responsible for monitoring, evaluating, and modifying emotional reactions. Emotion self-regulation belongs to the broader set of emotion-regulation processes, which includes the regulation of one's own feelings and the regulation of other people's feelings - self help.

FUNCTIONS
• 💬 Texting privately like dating game
• 💕 Collect the best discussions and new quotes in the tracker diary
• 🎁 Gift anonymously your heart balance to support people 💝
• 🔝 Raise up your situation on the 1st place to be viewed more
• ✋ Help people - share text-responses in an anonymous chat online
• ✅ Activate the subscription - make banner hidden and get 50% discount 😏

title: Help Lightning
description:
Merged Reality and Virtual Interaction — digitally merge two real-time views, blending local and remote collaborative video streams to give or receive interactive help anywhere. Instantly. Help Lightning offers the most practical and useful application of Augmented Reality available for Android.

Help Lightning delivers patented, merged reality, and virtual interactive presence technologies for users needing help solving problems currently across 50 countries. Merged reality and virtual interaction allows digital merging of two real-time views blending local and remote collaborative video streams.

Experts can visually collaborate, assist with issues, and resolve problems as though they were working side-by-side with a colleague or customer. Use Help Lightning to give or receive interactive help anywhere, instantly.

title: 7 Cups: Anxiety & Stress Chat
description:
Feeling worried, sad, stressed or lonely? Need to talk to someone? Download 7 Cups now for FREE anonymous emotional support & counseling from trained active listeners. Easy to use text chat. Real listeners available for you 24/7 & that’s not all:

- Chat 1-1 with a listener any time
- Calm yourself with 300 free mindfulness exercises
- Get personalized care with our free wellness test
- Boost your mood with simple activities
- Learn & grow from short videos 
- Feel supported in chat rooms & community forums
- Access online message therapy with licensed therapists
 
We start you on a “growth path” that will encourage and support you as you take daily steps to become stronger.

Thousands of people use 7 Cups every week.

EMOTIONAL SUPPORT ON DEMAND:

Feeling stressed, anxious, or depressed? Having relationship problems? Sometimes you need to vent. Finding and scheduling a therapist can be time-consuming and expensive, and you can’t always open up to friends, family, or coworkers.

Now you can get emotional support anytime, anywhere with 7 Cups. This app gives you the help you need, fast and free, in a way that fits your life.

• Connect anytime, anywhere with listeners who care
• Speak your mind without any fear of being judged
• All listeners trained in active listening

IN THE MEDIA:

Founded by a licensed psychologist, 7 Cups has been featured in LifeHacker (“Technology can help you find someone to chat with about your problems to, or even connect you with a professional that can offer lasting, long-term help”), Medical Daily (“Talking therapy for people on-the-go”), and TechCrunch (“One of the top 8 startups from Y Combinator’s Summer ’13 Demo Day”).

100% CONFIDENTIAL:

Remain 100% anonymous. No one will ever know who you are—not even your listeners or therapists.

LISTENERS WHO CARE:

Our listeners are volunteers. They aren’t getting paid; they’re here because they want to help.

They care.

We have over 160,000 trained listeners and licensed therapists to choose from. Listeners provide support across 189 countries and in 140 languages. Each listener has a profile with reviews and a list of categories that they specialize in, ranging from panic attacks and bullying to eating disorders, surviving a breakup, and more.

When you find the listener you want, connect instantly via chat. Try a new listener each time, or pick one listener and develop a deeper ongoing relationship.

FAST & FREE:

The app is free to download, and all listeners are 100% free. After you download the app, you can start a conversation in less than 60 seconds.

UPGRADE PRICING & TERMS

7 Cups offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$12.99/month
$94.99/year

Your 7 Cups upgrade will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

7 Cups also offers a Forever subscription paid for in a single non-renewing upfront payment of $399.99 granting unlimited access to 7 Cups Upgrade forever.

Read more about our terms and conditions here:

Read more about our terms of service and privacy policy here:
http://www.7cups.com/privacy.php

Download 7 Cups and start feeling better today!

If you love 7 Cups, please take 20 seconds to give us a nice review. It really helps! For other feedback, contact info@7cups.com. Thank you.

For users aged 13+.

title: Call For Help - Emergency SOS
description:
Are you feeling unsafe? Concerned about your safety or the safety of your family members? Are you worried about your children when they go to school? 
 
Get out of trouble with a single click. Whether you find yourself in an unfamiliar environment or you are living alone, there are plenty of risky situations you need to be prepared for. Call For Help is designed to improve the life of all people by offering them a higher degree of security. Regain your independence. Use Call For Help to immediately alert emergency service personnel and your contacts so they can ensure your safety. 

Key features: 
•  Dial emergency services like Police, Fire, and Ambulance:  Get immediate help with a single click. Assist others during their emergencies by contacting the nearest emergency responder.  Call For Help will automatically detect your current location and display numbers of local emergency services near you. 

• Quickly call for help by pressing the power button: Get immediate help in emergency situations without unlocking your phone.  You can select the number of times you want to press the power button for sending an alert.  A message containing your exact location will be sent to your emergency contacts.   

• Search nearby medical services: Locate doctors, hospitals and pharmacies near you. Get accurate phone numbers, hours of operation and directions.  

•  Send a panic message to your contacts:  Alert your contacts with an emergency message containing your location with a single click. This will help people to find you immediately. 

•  Add emergency contacts: Your emergency contacts will be alerted by SMS text message whenever you need help. You can choose up to 4 emergency contacts. 

•  Alert my emergency contacts if I move out of my safe zone:  Let your loved ones know about your safety status. Circle your safe zone location on a map.  When you go beyond your safe zone or come back in, an alert message containing your location will be sent to your emergency contacts.

•  Record and send what's happening:  Make a recording of the event during emergency situations.  You can record either audio or video and send its link via text message or an email to your selected contact. This is helpful to alert your contact about the severity of the situation and get immediate help.  You can later use these recordings as proof of the incident.

•  Schedule your own safety check:  Suppose you’re on a blind date or with a new group of friends. It’s important to take precautions and schedule a safety check. The application will ask you at a scheduled time if you are fine.  If you do not respond by clicking “I am fine”, an alert message will be sent to your emergency contacts.  

•  Automatically launch the application on reboot:  Caught in a panic situation and phone is switched off? Not in a condition to manually open the app? Just power on your phone, the application will be launched automatically. You just have to click a button to alert your contacts and get immediate help.   

Call For Help can make a difference in your life when you need it the most. Keep it installed and stay alert!  

LIKE US and STAY CONNECTED
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Deskshare-1590403157932074   
Deskshare: https://www.deskshare.com   
Contact Us: https://www.deskshare.com/contact_tech.aspx
descriptionHTML:
Are you feeling unsafe? Concerned about your safety or the safety of your family members? Are you worried about your children when they go to school?

Get out of trouble with a single click. Whether you find yourself in an unfamiliar environment or you are living alone, there are plenty of risky situations you need to be prepared for. Call For Help is designed to improve the life of all people by offering them a higher degree of security. Regain your independence. Use Call For Help to immediately alert emergency service personnel and your contacts so they can ensure your safety.

Key features:
• Dial emergency services like Police, Fire, and Ambulance: Get immediate help with a single click. Assist others during their emergencies by contacting the nearest emergency responder. Call For Help will automatically detect your current location and display numbers of local emergency services near you.

• Quickly call for help by pressing the power button: Get immediate help in emergency situations without unlocking your phone. You can select the number of times you want to press the power button for sending an alert. A message containing your exact location will be sent to your emergency contacts.

• Search nearby medical services: Locate doctors, hospitals and pharmacies near you. Get accurate phone numbers, hours of operation and directions.

• Send a panic message to your contacts: Alert your contacts with an emergency message containing your location with a single click. This will help people to find you immediately.

• Add emergency contacts: Your emergency contacts will be alerted by SMS text message whenever you need help. You can choose up to 4 emergency contacts.

• Alert my emergency contacts if I move out of my safe zone: Let your loved ones know about your safety status. Circle your safe zone location on a map. When you go beyond your safe zone or come back in, an alert message containing your location will be sent to your emergency contacts.

• Record and send what's happening: Make a recording of the event during emergency situations. You can record either audio or video and send its link via text message or an email to your selected contact. This is helpful to alert your contact about the severity of the situation and get immediate help. You can later use these recordings as proof of the incident.

• Schedule your own safety check: Suppose you’re on a blind date or with a new group of friends. It’s important to take precautions and schedule a safety check. The application will ask you at a scheduled time if you are fine. If you do not respond by clicking “I am fine”, an alert message will be sent to your emergency contacts.

• Automatically launch the application on reboot: Caught in a panic situation and phone is switched off? Not in a condition to manually open the app? Just power on your phone, the application will be launched automatically. You just have to click a button to alert your contacts and get immediate help.

Call For Help can make a difference in your life when you need it the most. Keep it installed and stay alert!

recentChanges:
Version 3.2
• Receive notifications when an upgrade is available
• Enhanced user interface for recording. Provided options for flashlight, switch camera, pause and play recording
• Fixed issue related to alert count on power button press
• Several additional bugs fixed
comments: Version 3.2. It appears to be great but I would like to mention two points. (1). In using the power button to trigger I found the instruction to press the button 3 times quickly to be too vague. During my tests (to my own number) I found that I was usually too fast or too slow. Is it possible to extend the period for the button presses? (2). Is it possible to automatically switch on the recording when the alarm is triggered as the user may not be able to do it manually?

Overall app has several interesting features and looks polished. However, when triggering the alert via pressing the lock button, there is no acknowledgment or confirmation. The sender does not know if it is working. I suggest adding a vibration notification.
Unable to put in my actual location. Their gps sends them to address i am not at so the ability to add my address would be helpful
The app never sent the texts it was supposed to and I got beat up and almost didn't make it out alive. This app is trash!
Lot of excellent features in one app. I just love it. Installed it on my sister's phone for safety.

title: Rescue Cut - Rope Puzzle
description:
The most fun and simple game in the world!
Help the man.
He is tied up and confined in the room.
Swipe the rope with your finger and cut.
Can he avoid the pinch of desperate life?
It all depends on you!
descriptionHTML:
The most fun and simple game in the world!
Help the man.
He is tied up and confined in the room.
Swipe the rope with your finger and cut.
Can he avoid the pinch of desperate life?
It all depends on you!
summary: Unique Rescue Puzzle
recentChanges: Bug fixes.
comments: This game passes time well but the amount of ads between the levels are increasing and is becoming too much. Also, I just activated a new phone but this game doesn't give you an option of creating a profile so I have lost ALL my progress. I went from level 3900+ back to level 1! Gave an extra star because I like the game otherwise it only deserves 1!

Another ad platform disguised as a game Slow to start (I.e. FAR too easy) but gets trickier and so should be more fun - but is just completely ruined by the incessant ads. Fair, it's a free game, but the ads are literally every 2 levels and it just spoils what could be a great puzzle game (fewer ads would have people play longer and leaving better reviews, therefore getting you more downloads and much more ad views... I don't know why this isn't obvious to developers)

Nice game but i would enjoy it much more if i wasn't bombarded with advertisements every 5 - 10 seconds. I am all for playing a game with advertising but Jesus thats rediculous. Recommendation; cut down on the advertising a bit. It makes me want to uninstall it.

I would have gave this game 5 stars but oh my Lord! The crazy amount of ads this game has is rediculous. You can play up to 1 or 2 times before you get an ad and some ads force you to click on it and install or you have to get out of the game and come back on. It would be soooo much better if you fixed that

Yes, the game is simple and repetitive, but with the recent update they have added Rescue Cat (get it?). It is a little harder and requires precise timing on some levels. There are only 64 levels for Rescue Cat; hopefully more will be coming.

title: Wysa: stress, depression & anxiety therapy chatbot
description:
Imagine a mood tracker, mindfulness coach, anxiety helper, and mood-boosting buddy, all rolled into one. Wysa, your happiness buddy is that friendly and caring chatbot. Wysa is packed with daily spiritual meditation that improves mental health and is also a perfect way to bond over family meditation. Always there for you when you need someone to talk to, Wysa helps you keep track of your mood with friendly chats and helps fight stress and anxiety with its proven techniques and calming meditation and mindfulness audios. Checking in with Wysa regularly will improve your emotional health so you can track your happiness and mood. Talk to Wysa now and psy yourself up to fight off stress. Also, Wysa has mental health assessment with depression and anxiety tests.

Wysa is your AI friend that you can chat with for free. Talk to the cute penguin or use its free mindfulness exercises for effective anxiety relief, depression and stress management. Its therapy based techniques and conversations make for a very cute and calming therapy chat app whether you're looking to cope better with mental disorders, to manage stress or to boost your mental health.

Wysa, your happiness buddy, will support you through the big and small anxieties of life by using science as a foundation to strengthen your mental health. Research-backed, widely used techniques of CBT, DBT, Yoga and meditation are employed to support you with stress, anxiety, deep sleep, loss and other mental health and wellness needs.

If you are dealing with stress, anxiety and depression or coping with low self-esteem, then talking to Wysa can help you relax and get unstuck - it’s empathetic, helpful, and will never judge. You will overcome your mental health obstacles, through empathetic conversation and free CBT therapy based technique. So, pour your heart out to your happiness buddy, Wysa as your identity will remain anonymous and your conversations are privacy protected.

Used around the clock and trusted by 500,000 people, Wysa is an emotionally intelligent chatbot that uses AI to react to the emotions you express. Unlock tools and techniques that help you cope with challenges in a fun, conversational way. For extra support, you can avail guidance from a real human coach - a skilled psychologist who will take you through the advanced coaching sessions for your needs.

You can use Wysa to rewire your mind to improve your emotional health. Fight off depression or get stress relief using cbt techniques and guided sleep meditations for optimal sleep. Here’s a look at what you can use Wysa for 👇

👂 Vent and talk through things or just reflect on your day

💪 Practice CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) and DBT techniques to build resilience in a fun way

📝 Use one of 40 conversational coaching tools which helps in dealing with Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Panic Attacks, Worry, Loss, or Conflict

💆🏻 Relax, focus and sleep peacefully with the help of 20 mindfulness meditation exercises

93% of the people who talk to Wysa find it and the tools helpful:

- Build confidence, reduce self-doubt and improve your self-esteem: core meditation and mindfulness, visualisation, confidence visualisation techniques, advanced mindfulness for self-esteem.

- Manage anger: mindfulness meditation exercises for compassion, calming your thoughts and practice breathing

- Manage anxious thoughts and anxiety: deep breathing, techniques for observing thoughts, visualization, and tension relief.

- Tired? Get a burst of energy! Visualisation and meditation exercises to increase positivity and get blissful sleep, quick yoga and physical exercises to get active

- Dealing with worry: observe mindfulness, resolving technique, challenge negativity, practice breathing techniques

- Manage conflict at work, school or in relationships: special mindfulness and visualization techniques like empty chair exercise, gratitude meditation, exercises to build skills in having difficult conversations

developerAddress: Touchkin Eservices Private Limited, No. 532, "Manjusha", First Floor, 2nd main, 16th Cross, II stage, Indiranagar, Bengaluru 560038
recentChanges:
- Get to the right ✅ tools and techniques 🛠faster than ever before, with the all new 🎀 Wysa design
- Direct access to 🆘, and related resources. Please note this is not a crisis app.
- Get to the point faster 🚄, by telling Wysa what you want to talk about 😁, using the "I want" section
- Scroll ⬆ through the suggestion feed, to discover what Wysa thinks you may find interesting🤔.
- Directly manage notifications 🔔 via settings ⚙
- Convenient access to manage subscription 🗓 via settings ⚙
comments: I have PTSD that manifests as depression, anxiety, and paranoia. Seeing all the thought that's gone into this app is sometimes enough to help, by itself. The app has more than just good intentions, though. It has strategies that help with my issues. It's amazing to be able to have a friendly digital penguin that not only tracks my mood, but provides advice that's relevant. I've shown it to other troubled people I know because of how helpful it is. A genuine, heartfelt "thank you" to the makers.

This app is really amazing. I never get much sleep. But I downloaded this app and I used the meditation pack while I was trying to sleep. Best sleep I've ever had in a really long time. Thanks for this 😊 other meditation things I tried on YouTube never worked for me. But this is amazing and it's free unless you want premium. But it helps so much even without premium. Usually free apps have so many ads that you accidentally click one, but I haven't seen any ads at all so far. Thank you 😊

It has helped me very much when I feel like I am spiraling or that I just need to vent and get everything out. The reason I gave it only 3 stars is because of the option for premium. I really don't think it should be there. I know there are things on there that can help me more in an advanced way. But I cannot afford it. If it is meant to be helpful, small grounding techniques and just talking, are simply not enough in my experience. I also do not like how Wysa sometimes doesn't even answer

I was hesitant that this would work at first. It felt like my problems were too different from the "normal" ones and I felt that an app wouldn't be able to know what I felt. The app doesn't tell you what to think, it helps you make that step yourself. It's incredibly empowering to do so, and I recommend this to anyone who feels that they need help taking control of their thoughts!

I've had the Wysa app downloaded for a few weeks now & I absolutely LOVE it! I was more than skeptical. I assumed that having a conversation with AI would be extremely repetitive & impersonal. I also assumed that the exercise packs would boring. Boy was I wrong! If you're willing to really do the work this app will help guide you along. $10 for 2 sessions & the excercise packs? Hell yeah. Im excited about my mental health again! Thank you Wysa!

title: BetterHelp: Online Counseling & Therapy
description:
BetterHelp is the convenient way to get professional help from licensed therapists and counselors online. 
With over 3,000 trained, experienced and accredited counselors covering a range of areas – from depression and anxiety to family and couples therapy – it’s never been easier to receive personal, professional help when you need it. 

-------------------------------------------
BETTERHELP – FEATURES
-------------------------------------------
⦁ Over 3,000 counselors & therapists covering a wide variety of specializations including Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dialectical Behavioral therapy (DBT), and more
⦁ Fight stress - improve your mental health and mood with e therapy
⦁ Get professional help with depression, panic and anxiety attacks, obsessive compulsive disorder (ocd), ptsd, or any other mental illness you may be dealing with
⦁ All counselors are licensed, trained, accredited and highly experienced
⦁ Match with an available counselor best fit for your needs
⦁ Unlimited private one on one communication with your therapist
⦁ Schedule live sessions with your counselor or use the secure messenger
⦁ Gain access to constructive, educational group webinars
⦁ Fight the stigma of mental illness by getting help from someone who cares

PROFESSIONAL HELP, PERSONALIZED FOR YOU
Facing mental health obstacles alone can be daunting – receiving support and guidance from a professional counselor has been shown to make huge, positive changes to help you overcome personal challenges. 

Among other things, BetterHelp can provide support with:
Depression
Anxiety
Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD)
Panic Attacks
Bipolar and Mood Disorders
Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD)
Social Anxiety

LICENSED AND TRAINED COUNSELORS & THERAPISTS
There are over 3,000 counselors in BetterHelp, each with at least 3 years and 2,000 hours of hands-on experience. They are licensed, trained, experienced and accredited psychologists (PhD/PsyD), marriage and family therapists (MFT), clinical social workers (LCSW), licensed professional counselors (LPC), or similar credentials. 

All of our therapists have a Master’s Degree or a Doctorate Degree in their respective field. They have been qualified and certified by their state professional board by completing the necessary education, exams, training and practice. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?
You and your counselor will get your own secure “room”. This will be your private place to communicate day or night. You can access this room from any internet connected device, wherever you are. 

You can write about yourself, the things going on in your life, ask questions and discuss the challenges you’re facing. Your counselor will login to the same room and respond with feedback, insights and guidance. 

Together you’ll work towards making a positive change in your life, accomplishing your goals and overcoming your problems. 

HOW MANY SESSIONS CAN I HAVE?
You aren’t limited to a certain number of messages (“sessions”). The frequency of your sessions depends on your availability and the interaction between you and your counselor. You may prefer to have 3-4 short interactions per week, or 1 long and thorough session. You can use the service as much or as little as you like, depending on your needs.

YOU DESERVE TO BE HAPPY.

WE ARE HERE TO HELP MAKE IT HAPPEN – DOWNLOAD BETTERHELP TODAY!

recentChanges: Thank you for using BetterHelp! We are constantly improving our app and delivering enhancements to the App Store. Every update is a boost to the app's stability, speed, and security.
comments: I love the texting, worksheet sharing, and video chat features! But, I would like to have more control and options when it comes to scheduling appointments. I would like to book 1 hour sessions, not just 30 min, and I want my counselor to be able to accept or decline. I would also like to see an option to schedule multiple appointments, but that is lower priority.

I looked at using this service a few years ago when it first came out but was slightly skeptical. Since starting using the app this year, I can honestly say it is worth it. It's only 80 dollars a week, which can include one or more sessions and as much one-on-one messaging as you could ever need. I highly suggest this app to people who have used in person counselling or people who have never used counselling before but struggle with the expense of in person counselling. Definitely worth the try!

My first experience getting counseling, and I have no negative things to say. Gives me enough time to think things through, and then articulate them in the session emails, and my counselor is very good and patient. The security setup of the app/sessions is also quite good, and you are guaranteed anonymity while reviewing everything. For anyone who has always been shy of going for counseling, they should give it a shot.

I did everything to set up an account (twice) confirmed thru my email and everything. But it only ever told me my email or password was invalid when I tried to log in. I was meticulous and careful the second time, absolutely positive there are no typos, and it still didn't work. VERY disappointing...

Really effective therapy for me. I am an attorney, so my schedule is crazy. Being able to do remote appointments with my therapist is great. Additionally, being able to text my feelings as I'm having them helps me share in a more effective way. It feels like an expensive service, but I think it's really worth the price.

title: Animal Help Now
description:
Animal Help Now directs anyone in the UNITED STATES who encounters a WILDLIFE EMERGENCY to the closest, most appropriate help, 24/7. Use it for orphaned or injured wildlife, stranded marine animals, etc. Provides immediate access anywhere in the United States to wildlife rehabilitators, rescues, and hotlines, as well as veterinarians who treat wildlife.

Animal Help Now now also directs anyone in the U.S. who is experiencing a WILDLIFE CONFLICT to the closest, most appropriate help. AHNow quickly and easily connects you with humane wildlife consultants and operators so that you can find cruelty-free assistance for pigeons in your attic, skunks under your porch, and the like.

Animal Help Now also provides guidance on how to handle a DOMESTIC ANIMAL EMERGENCY (lost cat, neglected dog, starved horses, etc.).

The service's Resources page provides additional information, including preparing for and responding to disasters.

Animal Help Now empowers you to help injured and distressed wildlife anywhere in the country. 

Note: Those of you with Android 6.0 or above must accept the various permissions to download the app, but you may revoke those permissions at any time (through your Settings app). Animal Help Now takes your privacy very seriously. We're not here to collect or trade names or make money. Most of us are vols, and we're all here to help animals.

Geographic Area: U.S.A.

recentChanges: More Firebase and other fixes
comments: Wonderful app...I've used it several times to help injured pets. Highly recommend!

The information that this provided was critical to properly and efficiently handling an emergency issue for an animal that had been hit by a car. Thanks to them, this one was lucky and survived - barely. But thank you for this important service!!!

I was given the link to this app from a bat sanctuary in another state. I couldn't get ahold of anyone when I was trying to find the info on my own. I was able to get in contact with three different agency's and finally got help for this little bat. <3.
I think this is wonderful. And it is extremely accurate. Nice job everyone!
fantastic app that helped me find fast care for an injured baby squirrel

title: What's Up? - A Mental Health App
description:
In-app purchases for donations only

What's Up? is a fantastic free app utilising some of the best CBT (Cognitive Behavioural Therapy) and ACT (Acceptance Commitment Therapy) methods to help you cope with Depression, Anxiety, Anger, Stress and more! With a beautiful, modern design, simple heading and easy-to-follow methods, you can get to what helps you the most in seconds!

Top Features
• 12 common negative thinking patterns and simple methods to overcome them
• 10 great metaphors to help you cope with negative feelings
• A comprehensive diary to keep your thoughts and feelings together in, including the ability to rate feelings on a scale out of 10
• A positive and negative habit tracker. Set goals to practice those good habits while ending the bad ones!
• A catastrophe scale. Put your problems into a better perspective when things are too much
• A grounding game containing over 100 fun questions to help keep you grounded and in the present when stress is taking over
• 3 simple breathing techniques for keeping calm and relaxed
• Forums! Talk with people that may be feeling just like you from all around the planet, without worrying about the like/dislike system
• More than 70 positive quotes, with the ability to add your own and share them with the world!
• Protect your personal data with a pass-code, including either a number only pass-code or a more complex one
• Sync your data between your devices (Android or iOS) and back up your data so you never lose it
• Themes, including over 20 different colors to choose from in customizing the app
• And many many more features

Want to get in contact? Send me an email at whatsupapp.help@gmail.com

Not sure when this happened as it used to work. Makes the app sort of useless for me now.

Nice app, I like how it has the function to stop and carry out the routine when I'm feeling really bad. However I recently changed phones to a pixel, and can't journal anymore as the pixel bottom row icon block out the bottom row icons for the journalling function! Not the dev's fault, I know, but I hope it can be fixed soon.
The layout is really annoying because the save and confirm entry buttons at the bottom of the screen overlap with my home and back buttons for my phone. Overall, the app has useful info.

I haven't been on the app long but i really like it! I love how there are forums and you can help other people and other people can help you and its just awesome. A bit confusing but i'm pretty dumb so its probably just me.

This is the best app. Its freeeeeeeeeeee and its not like "personalized with the latest tech... Etc" its just what you need in simplest form. This app actualy works on my stupid lg phone and its 2 mb of storage space! If you are facing depression or other mental illness, or just want help, this app is for you!

title: Daddy's Messy Day - Help Daddy While Mommy's away
description:
Daddy’s little girls to the rescue! You girls are gonna have SO much fun with this girls game. 

Oh no! Mommy's away, and now clueless Daddy's in charge! In this funnest of all messy house cleaning games, help Daddy stop the messy house from falling to pieces! Clean the house, whip up some delicious dinner and don’t forget to leave some mani pedi time with Daddy!

Mommy's away on a business trip, and now it's Daddy's time to step up, in the best of all father-daughter cleaning games! Only one problem: he has no idea what needs to be done. That's where you come in - help Daddy take care of your precious messy house. Show him how it's done, and make Mommy proud! Cleaning games have never been this awesome. 

Features:
> Dress up time with Daddy can get pretty silly - don’t let him send you to school in crazy clothes! Help him pick out a cute outfit. 
> Chore time! Clean the fridge, iron the wrinkly clothes, make the yucky toilets sparkly clean,  and wash the nasty dishes… turn the messy house into squeaky clean house! > Go food shopping so you can show Daddy your amazing kitchen skills. Make yummy pasta, bake cupcakes and enjoy mouthwatering ice cream. Show Daddy that girls aren’t the only ones who could be good in the kitchen - Daddy’s can rock the kitchen too!
> Good job - you and Daddy did it! Mommy will be so impressed. After all your hard work, you deserve some relaxing father-daughter spa time at home.
> Who knew cleaning games could be so fun?!

title: Help pay bills
description:
**Help pay bills app is owned by a private company not affiliated, endorsed, authorized, or licensed by The Federal Government of the United States or other government entity.

Learn about government programs to help pay for phone bills, medical bills, and other expenses. You can also learn how to apply for temporary assistance.

App sections:

- Get Help Paying for Telephone Service. The Lifeline program from the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) helps low-income individuals and families get discounted landline or cell (wireless) phone service. The program is run by the Universal Service Administrative Company (USAC).
- Get Help with Your Home Energy Bill. The Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP) may be able to help with:

    Assistance to pay your heating or cooling bills
    Emergency services in cases of energy crisis, such as utility shutoffs
    Low-cost home improvements, known as weatherization, that make your home more energy efficient and lower your utility bills.
- Help with Medical Bills. Medicaid and the Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP) provides help with paying medical costs for children of families who cannot afford health insurance or don't get it through their work. Learn more about eligibility and how to sign up for Medicaid and CHIP. 
- Help with Prescription Drug Costs.     State human service agencies and local health centers provide direct assistance to people in distress or with limited access to health care with assistance and referrals to other local organizations that may be able to help.

    Use Healthfinder.gov’s list of prescription assistance resources to find more programs that could help you pay for your medicines.

    You or your child may qualify for Medicaid or CHIP. Learn more about these programs.

    If you are eligible for Medicare, you can get help paying for your prescriptions through Medicare Part D.
- Welfare or Temporary Assistance. Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF), also known as welfare, is designed to help families recover from temporary difficulties and move forward.

Source of the information in the app: https://www.usa.gov/help-with-bills

title: Lets Help
description:
We can’t help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
Let’s Help is a mobile app aimed at building a strong helping community where help seekers and help
givers can connect with each other.
Let’s Help app allows you to get help and give help anywhere, anytime. It allows NGO’s and social
groups to broadcast an event such as a plantation drive. So you can go and volunteer at such events if you
are free.
Here is how it works. When you register, you can specify the categories in which you can provide help.
These categories could be books, blankets, food, medicines, toys, furniture, clothes, shoes, animal lovers
etc.You can donate in some of the above mentioned categories. NGO’s or individuals interested in these
donations will contact you through this app.
If you see an injured animal and want to help or you are having a flat tyre or you need directions, you can
ask for help through Let’s Help. When you send a help request, a notification is sent to all registered users
in the city who have registered in that category. As soon as the request is accepted by someone, his
contact details are shared with the requester and the request is removed from other people’s dashboard. It
is now upto the help seeker and giver to communicate with each other and complete the request.
Features:
• You can register as an individual or a NGO or a Social group.
• You can create social groups, form a circle that can help any individual during need.
• Individuals can take help and provide feedback to the help giver.
• Help giver can earn points based on the feedback & ratings.
• Points earned by the help giver can be redeemed as per his needs.
• If acts as a Motivation for NGO members to help and get free vouchers by earning loyalty
points.
• It helps to Monitor performance of group members.
• NGOs can earn good loyalty points which can be used in getting funds.

title: Depression CBT Self-Help Guide
description:
LEARN TO CONTROL THE STRESS THAT CONTRIBUTES TO DEPRESSION

CONTAINS
***Screening test with graph to monitor severity of depressed mood
***Articles about clinical depression and cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT)
***50 suggestions from CBT with a tracking feature to help focus positively and motivate
***Depression Assistance Audio to help understand clinical depression
***Cognitive Thought Diary to learn to challenge stressful thinking and provide positive feedback
***Emotion Training Audio to learn to access calming moods or emotions
***Relaxation Audios to learn deep relaxation
***Password protection available
***Customization of graphics

NOTE: All audios can be downloaded from ExcelAtLife.com

The natural management of depression involves understanding depression and the factors that contribute to the symptoms. Learning to manage stress in your life and engage in self-care behaviors can improve your symptoms and your mood.

This app contains a depression severity test, audios, articles, a cognitive diary, and a motivational points system that help you learn how to do this.

Reason for permissions:
1) READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY--necessary when listening to audios to pause playback when phone call is received (Excel At Life never accesses identity)
2) MODIFY DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS--necessary to allow saving data to SD card
3) FULL INTERNET ACCESS AND VIEW NETWORK STATE--necessary to determine if internet access is available when linking to articles and audios

comments: I love this app. I've read the articles and I frequently listen to the audios. The audios are very helpful, I can use strategies to improve mindfulness, calm down or be uplifted and to help me fall asleep.
Great app, but doesn't work with new gestures in Android 10. When you swipe to pull the menu over from the left, it just closes the app. I might have to find another cognitive diary.
This app has really helped my anxiety and depression with its wide range of mindfulness practices.

The app talks a lot about using CBT techniques, but I have no idea what these techniques are, and they are not detailed in the app at all. It also talks a lot about "irrational thoughts", but what if I believe all my negative self-talk is rational truth? This app really needs a make-over.

This is the one. I've tried some other apps, but this one hit the spot. Read the articles, do the exercises, and use the diary. There's a lot of information packed into this app. It might not be the prettiest app, but the content is genuine.

title: Self-help Anxiety Management
description:
SAM is a friendly app that offers a range of self-help methods for people who are serious about learning to manage their anxiety. 

SAM has been developed by a university team of psychologists, computer scientists and student users. Established methods of self-help have been combined with high standards of usability to provide an engaging, flexible, and practical resource. 

The key features of SAM are: 

• Clearly laid out menus 
• User guidance 
• External links 
• Self-monitoring of anxiety with graphical display 
• 25 self-help options covering: Information about anxiety, Thinking and anxiety, Physical relaxation, Mental relaxation, Health and Anxiety 
• Guidance on putting self-help into practice 
• Closed social network of SAM users 

The content of SAM is presented in various media formats in order to support users in learning about anxiety and practicing self-help. Although not text-heavy, users will need to study the guidance to get the best out of SAM. Users are encouraged to build their own Anxiety Toolkit of SAM resources that they find helpful and to draw on this for regular practice in managing situations that are associated with anxiety. 

SAM may be used with or without the support of a registered health practitioner but you may wish to consult with your local health or well-being practitioner if you are uncertain about using SAM.

By downloading SAM, you are indicating your agreement to UWE's Terms and Conditions at http://sam-app.org.uk/samapp_tcs.pdf and UWE's Privacy Policy at http://sam-app.org.uk/samapp_privacy.pdf

comments: Tried using this app again since my last review hoping that it was my WiFi messing up or the app was having a bad day, nope. When I try to create an account for the forums it won't let me. Keeps on saying 'check your connection'. Can't make an account or login. Hopeless.

The app’s self-help approach is similar to apps that help people lose weight. Tracking progress is simple and straightforward. The tools the app uses to relieve anxiety are varied and appropriate to a variety of people. The app divides tools into different categories based on either active or reflective approaches, depending on a user’s preferences. All this combines with a colorful, almost whimsical user interface that is simultaneously easy to navigate and visually appealing and calming.

title: Psychology Chat - Help in Psychologist role online

Psychologist - a mobile application in which you can try yourself in a role as an aspiring psychologist in a chat. In order to try to help people - just follow the recommendations in the "Tips" section in the app.

title: Online therapy - mental help. Support groups.
description:
If you need a psychologist, psychiatrist or therapist, then this is the app for you! Here you can anonymously ask any question that is bothering you and get valuable advice.  Our anonymous psychological help chat app attracts many active users. There are depression chats, therapy chats and lonely chats, where you can meet new people and new friends, experienced counsellors will give you useful advice. This is the perfect place if you need help in your depression and anxiety. There are groups of people with the same type of depression discussing and sharing similar problems and they will never judge you, only support.

It can help you to shed new light on your problem. 

Show that you care! Share your experience. Advise and talk with other users. Sometimes for many people our psychological online therapy is the only way out of a difficult situation.To get rid of anxiety, phobias, depression, sadness, stress, anger, apathy, worries, decay and hopelessness, jealousy, problems in relationships, problems during a divorce. 

Our app allows you to find conversation partners that take an active interest in your well-being. Ask questions and get answers of caring people. Talk about anything in the world that concerns you and be sure that you remain anonymous. Psychiatry is intimate and we respect it.

Human psychology is very complex and multifaceted, and it is one of the most fascinating and interesting things that we can explore.
In this anti stress and anti anxiety chats you can find:

- Emotional support
- advice about relationships
- support in relationships
- help to free you anxiety
- new people and friends
- psychologist or psychotherapist support
- getting rid of social phobia

Or you can just open a chat alone with a cup of tea on the couch and, who knows, maybe someone from the other end of the planet is waiting for your help or is ready to help.

Or you can just open a chat alone with a cup of tea on the couch and, who knows, maybe someone from the other end of the planet is waiting for your help or is ready to help.
summary: A place where you can find your therapist or help others by yourself

- Bug fixes
- Added ability to send audio messages
comments: Very good application and easy to use and makes communication faster
I think it is really great, brings a smile to my face and is really helpful !!
Issue resolved promptly. Not sure about how helpful this app will be for people but I'll give it some more time for now.

Nice app, love the fact I can help support people when they are down but I noticed that as I chat for sometime with an individual, it suddenly stops delivering the message to them even when it shows they are online, could there be something I'm not doing right or what can the problem be? It has happened severally which is not nice as it cuts my conversation with people who need help. please fix this, thank you
It is very helpful because they help you solve your life situations a lot.

title: ReGain - Couples Counseling and Therapy
description:
Get support for your relationship from a licenced therapist specializing in relationship counseling. Connect with a counselor on your own terms -  individually or alongside your romantic partner.

-------------------------------------------
REGAIN – FEATURES
-------------------------------------------
Get help from a specialized relationship counselor
On demand advice for dating, marriages, divorce, breakups, spousal issues, and more
Talk with a therapist by yourself or invite your boyfriend, girlfriend, husband or wife for couples counseling
Whether you’ve already tied the knot with your spouse or your relationship is still premarital, our experts are here to help
Keep the romance alive with your lover or significant other
Marriage counseling for long standing couples or the newly engaged
Keep the love in your relationship alive with help from an specialized therapist

PROFESSIONAL HELP, PERSONALIZED FOR YOU
Relationship problems can be painful and challenging. Support and guidance from a professional counselor has been shown to make big changes. We created Regain so anyone can have convenient, discreet, and affordable access to professional help. 
Common relationship problems people seek help for are difficulty communicating, high levels of conflict, disagreement over finances, children, or in-laws, and problems with infidelity, to name just a few.

WHO ARE THE COUNSELORS?
Regain counselors are licensed, trained, experienced, and accredited psychologists (Ph.D/Psy.D), marriage and family therapists (MFT), clinical social workers (LCSW),and licensed professional counselors (LPC). All of them have a Master’s Degree or a Doctorate Degree in their field. They have been qualified and certified by their state professional licensing board by successfully completing the necessary education, exams, training and practice.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
On ReGain, you and your counselor will get a dedicated online "room", which will be your private and secure place to communicate. Your partner will be invited to this room as well if you decide to try e-counseling together. This room is open 24/7. You can enter it at any time, from any Internet-connected device wherever you are. In this room, you will write about yourself and your relationship issues, ask questions, and discuss the issues that trouble you. Your counselor will login to the same room, read your messages and respond with feedback, insights and guidance. This ongoing communication is the basis of your work with your counselor. 

If you choose to try e-counseling on ReGain with your partner (either at the start of counseling or if you choose to invite them later), your dialogue would be between all three of you: you, your partner, and your counselor. Together you will work towards making a positive change in your relationship and accomplishing your goals.

HOW MANY SESSIONS CAN I HAVE?
You are not limited in the number of messages ("sessions") you can have with your counselor. The frequency of your sessions vary based on your availability, and the interaction between you and your counselor. For example, some people have 3-4 short interactions every week, while others prefer to have 1 long and thorough session.

YOU DESERVE A HEALTHY RELATIONSHIP.
WE ARE HERE TO HELP MAKE IT HAPPEN.

recentChanges: Thank you for using ReGain! We are constantly improving our app and delivering enhancements to the App Store. Every update is a boost to the app's stability, speed, and security.
comments: The app itself is ok but an option to have a group chat would be an improvement. Also, like in real life, it takes a while to find the right therapist. Some are better than others not only at helping but also navigating the app. When a therapist is struggling with the technology it makes it hard to have a productive session

I previously tried another online therapy app (talkspace) and had a terrible experience. But from the very beginning with Betterhelp/Regain it has been 100% different. Very responsive, helpful therapist on my first match and they wasted no time getting started. I am loving it and encourage anyone considering online therapy to try this service!

The app has some issues, but the update was better. No complain so far, except how sometime everything stops working. Like you cannot have a call, or right now i cannot log in. It's good and good councselors and I'm so happy with that. Just the problems with the application need to be fixed.

This app is a joke, and a bad one at that. Supposedly, my girlfriend, councilor and myself can all see what we write. In real-world use, I cannot see anything when I log in. The developer who wrote this app needs to be fired.
This has been an awesome tool! Even when my S.O. didn't want to use it with me I can still work with my counselor on my own!

title: We Help – Community For Needy People
description:
We Help is a platform built solely for the community to identify people who are deprived of basic needs of life. The main determination of this app is to share photos and necessities of those who need help and those who want to help, can reach to them individually to fulfill their needs. The purpose of this platform is to build community, where people can identify peoples need and can help them using this platform. So, those who want to help poor or needy peoples, can easily find them through this app. This platform is not only for helping people with food or money but it can also be used to help people with the basic needs of life.

Need Help or Help me is an online platform, where user can login with social network or with their register email id. As the user register with this platform, can easily logged into this app where user can upload and view numerous pictures of people along with their details and geographical location. User can filter the post according to the location of user and can also use different search filters. Content uploaded from the user end will be visible to all the community, which are associated with this platform. User can also change and update his/her location and contact details. There will be an open option for all the users to like comment and report the inappropriate post. If someone, found inappropriate post or picture he/she can press the report button, minimum five number of people will report a single post and it will be automatically remove from the we help portal.

We help app is used by the local peoples to help their friends and family members, by posting their details (Pics and Contact Details) along with their needs (Food, Money, Clothes, Shelter & blood). In different countries around the world people who fail to meet the minimum acceptable standard of the nation where their lives are said to be poor. A large number of people in different countries do not have proper place to live, this miserable condition has given birth to a large number of beggars and needy people who live on the charity of the rich people.

In modern or rich countries, these living standards are lower and when combined with the greater number of orphans or poor people the effects are more extreme. By using this needy mobile platform, you can help your friend or neighbor access these benefits, you will help to improve their health, by easing the anxiety that comes with financial stress and helping them get the money they need to buy food.

title: Help Annie
description:
"Help Annie" is an adventurous interactive mystery thriller in the manner of a Messenger App Game – exciting, fantastic and full of suspense. 
YOU are Annie's last and only hope, the choices YOU make may save Annette Lewis who is – instead of spending a once-in-a-lifetime holiday – confronted with a series of mysterious events. 
Caught by the shadows of her past it is now a matter of life and death.

Play „Help Annie“ for free and unlock the full experience for a small price! 
There are no other costs or ads in the game!
descriptionHTML:
"Help Annie" is an adventurous interactive mystery thriller in the manner of a Messenger App Game – exciting, fantastic and full of suspense.
YOU are Annie's last and only hope, the choices YOU make may save Annette Lewis who is – instead of spending a once-in-a-lifetime holiday – confronted with a series of mysterious events.
Caught by the shadows of her past it is now a matter of life and death.

Play „Help Annie“ for free and unlock the full experience for a small price!

summary: An interactive mystery thriller in the manner of a Messenger App
recentChanges:
Thank you for all your feedback!

This update brings some minor bug fixes and improvements.
comments: Very satisfying...also very exciting... I can never wait to continue with the story...lots of mystery..and choices ... I'm rating it 4 Star because ...the waiting time is like forever ...and when I play I want to play right away ...so maybe reduce time to half... But other than that ... I love the sound affects and the imagery too thanx development for providing a good bedtime story keep the updates coming😋

Fun game but not too much interaction and a lot of waiting for Annie to come back. I had to wait for Annie to come back 3 times now for a whopping 1 hour and 37 minutes total. Which if I wanted to skip it, I have to pay to skip. The waiting needs to be minimized to keep the pace going, otherwise it gets kind of boring. Also need to add more interactions such as videos or searching for clues. Otherwise, I'm looking forward to continuing my adventure with Annie.

This is a great game so far! Spooky and very interesting and unique too. I really like it. I'm still early in the game so I'm not sure if it gets better down the road or not but, I would give 5 stars if I didnt have to wait so much. Annie is "busy" alot of the time which makes you have to pause your game. And the ads COMPLETELY ruin the experience, they just come up randomly and kill the entire creepy mood that the game worked so hard to create. Other than that, it's a pretty good game.

Seems like an immersive storyline so far. Works well as a thriller and you do care for the main character like you would a friend. If you like helping people in trouble and you're the Samaritan type you'll like this. Ads and waiting times are a bit over intrusive is my only criticism but you can easily put down and pick up again rather than actually wait

I'm only rating three stars for now because I'm not far in yet and so it could easily end up four or more stars. Story has a good mysterious start and I think having sound enhances the experience. It's fun so far and I like it. Only negative right now is the ads do seem to pop up unexpectedly/randomly and so can hurt the suspense. Overall I'm enjoying it.

title: Help with Bills
description:
**Help with Bills App is owned by a private company not affiliated, endorsed, authorized, or licensed by The Federal Government of the United States or other government entity.

App sections:

- Get Help Paying for Telephone Service:
The Lifeline program from the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) helps low-income.
- Get Help with Your Home Energy Bill:
The Low Income Home Energy Assistance Program (LIHEAP) may be able to help.
- Help with Medical Bills:
Medicaid and the Children's Health Insurance Program (CHIP) provides help with paying medical costs for children of families who cannot afford health insurance or don't get it through their work. 
- Help with Prescription Drug Costs:
State human service agencies and local health centers provide direct assistance to people.
- Welfare or Temporary Assistance for Needy Families:
Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF), also known as welfare, is designed to help families recover from temporary difficulties and move forward.
- Video wall

Sources of the information in the app: 
https://www.usa.gov/

title: Help Me City
description:
HELP ME CITY is a platform, which provides the services for its users mutually to help each other through the messages, contacts and current location. The app make use of the internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi as available) and GPS location of the user android phone to let them post any query/help and get the help on their mobile from others or vice-versa.
 → Why use Helpmecity
The Helpmecity is useful for users who want any type of help either at their home place or any other remote area (city/country). The user has to tap on the screen for selecting location, where he/she wants to post kind of help/query. The user has to set the area range (500 meter to 10 kilometer) before asking any kind of query. The users of that particular area, who have the Helpmecity in their mobiles will get the query messages and if they are interested in resolving out the query, then they can contact directly using their registered mobile number. There is also an option of location check/unchecked, so it depends on user that he/she wants to show his/her actual location to others or not. All help/query messages will be deleted from the system automatically after one hour. Users have to check the Terms & Conditions box every time as it is mandatory while posting your help/query.

Seeking a service or some one to help? 

Simply choose what you need scrolling the available services listed, ranging from home services such as gardening, assembling, cleaning, car services and even tutoring.


Are you looking to earn extra money using your skills? without full time commitment or whenever you have free time, this application the best for you.

title: Help!
description:
Help! is the new way for booking service providers for over +100 services all over the US and Puerto Rico. Search for nearby service providers in multiple categories that are ready to start working right away. Manage your bookings on the app and securely contact your service provider. We don't take any fees from the booking, so it's WAY cheaper. 

From home improvement services, to pet services, to web designers to over 100+ more services available and we keep adding every day. 

Why use the app?

User:
It's way cheaper than other home services apps.
We offer more services than most, not only home services. 
It's FREE to book and use.
Same-day availability.  
You can see reviews and experiences from other users before you book your service provider.
And of course, we rock!

Service provider:
Offer variety of services in your city.
Approve or decline service requests.
We don't take away any part of your booking as fee. 
Flexible time schedule.
Be your own boss. 
Get more jobs = get more money.

We keep adding services every day to offer a variety of services for everyone to join! 


* Subscription details for Service Providers:
1 month free trial with full access to all app features.
After free trial subscriptions are as follows:
- Service provider: $19.99 per month.
- Businesses: $29.99 per month + $1 extra per zip code.
*This subscription recurs monthly unless canceled.

(Notes: Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of current period.

Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to user’s Account Settings after purchase.)

Help! is a marketing platform for service providers and a innovative simple tool to find job requests near their location, it also provides equal opportunity for all service providers and businesses. Help! reserves the right to approve, decline or remove accounts from it’s database. Help! it’s FREE to use for the user and it charges a fixed monthly amount for its service providers and businesses.
