comments: They definitely need a night mode, cause it's very bright otherwise. I also think they need the option to secure the app a little bit more by preventing the ability to take screenshots. Lots of other Bank and Med apps do so by using the SECURE flag in Android. Would make me feel more comfortable on the app. (And if they added a toggle option for that, that'd be even better. Allowing other users to take screenshots if they wanted to) Other than that, it's okay.

Pros: the app is intuitively designed, and relatively inexpensive compared with traditional therapy. Cons: it took me the better part of the day of messaging back and forth to get through the intake questionnaire, set up a subscription plan, get matched with a therapist, and explain to her my problem. At the end of it all my therapist I had been paired with told me that she couldn't help me because I was in Canada. The whole thing took me 5 hrs since I downloaded the app, and I'm no better off.

I started using this service last month. I live my therapist and feel like I'm definitely being helped. But MAN the app needs some love. The voice recorder cuts you off after 5 minutes and when you're recording something emotional, having to start and stop is very aggravating. It will also randomly stop playing a message and I have to start over and there is no option to skip forward/backward to find the spot you left off. A search option in the room would be nice too

The app is ok, but when i installed it it didnt say anything about needing to pay. Its hard for teens whos mums or dads dont care about them or dont even know they are suffering. I was very dissapointed when they said i had to pay... I would like to see a differance in this. For me i just turned a teen and ive been suffering from dipression for a long time. My mum doesent even know. So for people like me, its really hard. I achually thought i was finally gonna get help, but i geuss not....

Feels like a waste of time and money. I was able to switch to a different therapist and still found it non useful. The therapist responds whenever they feel like for instance it took 5 hrs to get my 1st response, then another 5 for the second.

title: HabitCoach: Practice Self-Help Book Summaries
description:
"You will get what you desire in life only when you decide to become the best version of yourself by investing in your personal growth and professional development. The best self-help book summaries are one tap away from you - Change your mind! Start your self-improvement and personal development - Build good habits!

Learn how motivation works: What does it take to be truly healthy? How can you set goals for yourself? What are the best productivity hacks? Then, learn to apply these strategies and acquire new life habits.

HabitCoach will help you with your journey along the way. You will learn from the best self-help books, HabitCoach will remind you to take action, you will acquire new habits and mindsets, and finally, you will become the person you’ve always wanted to be.

The app is 100% based on the best self-help books, such as The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, Principles by Ray Dalio, Atomic Habits, No Excuses by Brian Tracy, and more. We summarized all of this knowledge to provide you with the most important points—list of habits and principles, so you can easily apply them to your life. HabitCoach has over 1,500 of these habits already!

HabitCoach is not a habit tracker! It’s much more than that. HabitCoach provides you with tools to learn new life and business strategies, acquire principles, change your mindset, and adopt new habits. HabitCoach is a self-improvement app. Prepare for total life changes!

⏩Here are a few things that HabitCoach will help you with:⏪
✔️ Leadership skills - HabitCoach has one full development path based on 10 best-selling books that focuses only on this skill.
✔️ Personal productivity - HabitCoach has strategies and habits from eight of the best books about this subject.
✔️ Self-esteem and confidence - Discover how to change your inner dialogue, and you will change the way you approach new challenges.
✔️ Daily mantras - Learn to craft mantras that are practical and effective.
✔️ Daily routine - Learn how to design your perfect routine based on five books on the subject. Build good habits.
✔️ Mental health - Master and overcome your stress, depression, and anxiety. Change your mind!
✔️ Physical health - It’s not only about healthy eating and exercising. Discover the intricacies and habits involved in improving physical health.
✔️ Self-discipline - Probably the best book on this topic is The Willpower Instinct. You will find all those strategies in this app.
✔️ Self-love - Doing one simple exercise every morning will help you learn to love yourself. You will find instructions in the list of habits from The Code of the Extraordinary Mind.
✔️ Mindfulness - It’s not only meditation. It’s about giving attention to every aspect of your life.
✔️ Positive affirmations - These affirmations work only if you connect them with taking action. Action is the element that proves who you really are. HabitCoach will help you to take action.
✔️ High performance - Have you ever heard of the book High Performance Habits? It’s a great book; and yes, HabitCoach has all the habits in our app.
✔️ Morning motivation - You cannot improve yourself 100% overnight. But what you can do is improve 1% every single day. And beginning your morning with something that will inspire you is extremely beneficial.
✔️ Self-discovery - There are things that you don’t know that you don’t know.
✔️ Goal setting - There are different methodologies recommended by different coaches. Check out ✔️ Getting Things Done (aka gtd) and Awaken The Giant Within by Anthony Robbins.
✔️ Self-control - Work on mindfulness, and then use strategies to gain full control of your mind.

Want more? In the app, you can read the entire self-help book summaries for free. Just remember, what really matters is being able to actually apply the habits and strategies from these books.

Change your mind - Improve your mental health and knowledge!

➡️➡️➡️ Download this personal development and self-help app - Build good habits & start your personal growth!"
descriptionHTML:
"You will get what you desire in life only when you decide to become the best version of yourself by investing in your personal growth and professional development. The best self-help book summaries are one tap away from you - Change your mind! Start your self-improvement and personal development - Build good habits!

Learn how motivation works: What does it take to be truly healthy? How can you set goals for yourself? What are the best productivity hacks? Then, learn to apply these strategies and acquire new life habits.

HabitCoach will help you with your journey along the way. You will learn from the best self-help books, HabitCoach will remind you to take action, you will acquire new habits and mindsets, and finally, you will become the person you’ve always wanted to be.

The app is 100% based on the best self-help books, such as The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, Principles by Ray Dalio, Atomic Habits, No Excuses by Brian Tracy, and more. We summarized all of this knowledge to provide you with the most important points—list of habits and principles, so you can easily apply them to your life. HabitCoach has over 1,500 of these habits already!

HabitCoach is not a habit tracker! It’s much more than that. HabitCoach provides you with tools to learn new life and business strategies, acquire principles, change your mindset, and adopt new habits. HabitCoach is a self-improvement app. Prepare for total life changes!

⏩Here are a few things that HabitCoach will help you with:⏪
✔️ Leadership skills - HabitCoach has one full development path based on 10 best-selling books that focuses only on this skill.
✔️ Personal productivity - HabitCoach has strategies and habits from eight of the best books about this subject.
✔️ Self-esteem and confidence - Discover how to change your inner dialogue, and you will change the way you approach new challenges.
✔️ Daily mantras - Learn to craft mantras that are practical and effective.
✔️ Daily routine - Learn how to design your perfect routine based on five books on the subject. Build good habits.
✔️ Mental health - Master and overcome your stress, depression, and anxiety. Change your mind!
✔️ Physical health - It’s not only about healthy eating and exercising. Discover the intricacies and habits involved in improving physical health.
✔️ Self-discipline - Probably the best book on this topic is The Willpower Instinct. You will find all those strategies in this app.
✔️ Self-love - Doing one simple exercise every morning will help you learn to love yourself. You will find instructions in the list of habits from The Code of the Extraordinary Mind.
✔️ Mindfulness - It’s not only meditation. It’s about giving attention to every aspect of your life.
✔️ Positive affirmations - These affirmations work only if you connect them with taking action. Action is the element that proves who you really are. HabitCoach will help you to take action.
✔️ High performance - Have you ever heard of the book High Performance Habits? It’s a great book; and yes, HabitCoach has all the habits in our app.
✔️ Morning motivation - You cannot improve yourself 100% overnight. But what you can do is improve 1% every single day. And beginning your morning with something that will inspire you is extremely beneficial.
✔️ Self-discovery - There are things that you don’t know that you don’t know.
✔️ Goal setting - There are different methodologies recommended by different coaches. Check out ✔️ Getting Things Done (aka gtd) and Awaken The Giant Within by Anthony Robbins.
✔️ Self-control - Work on mindfulness, and then use strategies to gain full control of your mind.

Want more? In the app, you can read the entire self-help book summaries for free. Just remember, what really matters is being able to actually apply the habits and strategies from these books.

Change your mind - Improve your mental health and knowledge!

➡️➡️➡️ Download this personal development and self-help app - Build good habits & start your personal growth!"
summary: Personal development & self-improvement | Build good habits | Mental health

title: Call for Help
description:
How safe do you feel you are? Looking for all in one solution for security and safety concerns? Look no further because this is an end to all your safety issues. 
An all in one solution to help your contacts track you, whenever you feel unsafe. Call emergency contacts with just a single tap on your phone. Call for Help is designed to help you in times of distress and make you feel safe whenever you feel otherwise.

Key Features:

•	Dial to your set emergency contact with one tap- Set contacts of your near and dear ones as your emergency contact and whenever in distress just one tap and your location would be sent to them.

•	Record Videos and Images- Record videos, audio and capture images in any stressful and unsafe environment and send it right away to your close ones.

•	Search nearby Facilities- Search for nearby police stations, hospitals and fire stations or emergency doctor all with a single tap and connect to them.

•	Emergency Tracking- Let your emergency contacts track you whenever you feel unsafe.

•	Its Free- The app is completely free to use!

In today’s world where you cannot be sure about your safety anywhere, Call for Help promises to be your saviour during times of distress. Whenever you are in trouble, just one tap is all you need. Trust CFH to make you feel safe when you step out. Enter the world of safety with CFH.

Available in English, Hindi and Bengali languages. Easy to use. Simple yet Effective!

title: Psychiatry Pro-Diagnosis,Info,Treatment,CBT & DBT
description:
Psychiatry PRO-Project Reach Out is a free Mental Health App that is akin to having your own Personal Psychiatrist & Psychotherapist all rolled up into one and available to you anywhere anytime.Mental health,wellness & well-being made easy & free.

Based on simple questions it can test for Diagnose Mental Health Disorders and then give information about Diseases & Treatment options Pharmacotherapy,Psychotherapy & then also offers Interactive Disorder specific detailed Self-help CBT courses. 

Our Comprehensive App currently offers:-
Diagnostic test of Mental Disorders 
Information 
Psychotherapy-Cognitive Behavior Therapy 
Dialectic Behavior Therapy
Mood & Thought Record Diary 
Suicide Prevention 
Personal Development  
Alcohol Addiction Counselling 
Substance Abuse Counselling 
Quote of the day
Chat
Forums
Anonymous posts
Bibliotherapy 
Nutritional information  

1.Diagnosis
Screening Psychiatric Interview Tests based upon the Diagnostic & Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders (DSM-5) similar to a real-world Psychiatric Assessment. This Comprehensive Diagnostic Screening tool currently tests disorders such as Depression,Anxiety disorders,Panic Attacks,Social Anxiety, Phobias, Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD),Post traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD),Body dysmorphia,Eating disorders,Anorexia & Bulimia nervosa, Binging & Purging,Bipolar disorder including Mania & Hypomania,Schizophrenia & Psychosis, Insomnia,Self harm & Suicidality,Borderline or Emotionally Unstable Personality disorder & Antisocial Personality Disorder,Alcohol Addiction & Substance Abuse etc

2.Information 
The App provides a Library of Professional level Information about  Prevalence,Incidence,Pathogenesis,Prognosis & Treatment of Psychiatric Disorders.Knowledge and awareness instill a less negative approach to mental health problems and improves Treatment Outcomes..

3.Psychotherapy 
What you think is,what you feel is,what you do! Thus changing thoughts and behaviors can change how a person is feeling which is basically what Cognitive Behavior Therapy or CBT is,a Talk therapy clinically proven to work & widely used in clinical practice.App also included DBT Dialectical Behavior Therapy specific for Borderline Personality Disorder.

4.Mood & Thought Record Diary 
App includes a Mood & Thought Record Diary which are essentially parts of CBT & help in recognizing Negative Automatic Thoughts and then subsequently changing theses & core-beliefs,behaviors and feelings in-turn.

5.Suicide Prevention 
There is a separate Suicide Prevention section with a worldwide phone and website directory and modules such as distress tolerance and suicide safety planning.

6.Personal Development
CBT based Wellness & Personal Development section with Interactive Self-help Programs based on Cognitive Behavior Therapy with Worksheets and exercises to boost mental health and well-being. This covers topics such as Procrastination, Anger Management, Self-Esteem, Assertiveness, Self-love, Perfectionism and Mindfulness.

7.Alcohol and Substance Abuse Addiction Counselling 
The app includes addiction counselling materials based on CBT Principles and can help users overcome problems with addiction to alcohol or other substances such as illicit drugs.

8.Quote of the day,Chat,Forums,Anonymous posts,Bibliotherapy & Nutrition 
The app includes Features such as Anonymous Problem Posting, Quote of the day,Chat-rooms, Forums,Nutrition & Supplements information,Books to read,Motivational Articles are included.

9.Video e-CBT -Work in progress
Our Trained CBT Therapist is currently working on a Video Series ,which is first of its kind E-CBT series.The videos will be emulating real life Clinical Psychotherapy sessions.

10.Future features-Work in progress  
Team plans to implement One-on-one Video/Audio Psychiatric Consultation with a Psychiatrist, One-on-one Video Psychotherapy sessions & Group Audio Support Sessions With Our Trained CBT Therapist, Psychotherapist & Life-Coach in the near future..

comments: I have been trying to learn technology and biuld something like this app. I do wish the doctors would be ope. Minded and start using the computer and phone as video conference call in times i do not get to an appointment. They have time to call why not just make it a video call. Not for offical stuff. But just to record my real time situation. Instead of a negative assuming statement...

I have to keep giving name and e mail every time I want to change from one topic to another. It dismisses possible diagnoses after one question. I am a masters level psychologist/counselor, and am familiar with the dsm V. Yes some symptoms are essential, but many are, say, 3 of the following 5 symptoms make the problem suspicious if not possible per that manual. Also, there are many types of mental health professionals, ex: psychiatrists, psychologists, counselors, cbt, Gestalt, etc. My reply.
Excellent Self Help App! Very Informative Self Help Exercises that anyone can print out and do on their own at home.

I had originally posted a reprimand i redacted. I dont feel it is safe to have what can be seen as diagnostic tools, easily available for android. But these arent diagnostic tools. See, rescuers are an epidemic, and can seriously harm. But this program is more like a few replacement references. A lot of it is simply like entries youd find if googling a problem, but well organized. I guess if rescuers get hold of this..this psych doc..feels they might do a few things proper. Maybe. Slap them.

So badly done it is comical. The icons are blurry and diificult to read, the fonts are equally fuzzy and unnecessarily ornate, the colours are comic book like, and it is badly organised. Where is psychopathy, for example? Badly indexed and poor search functjon. Really amateurish effort, based on a bad attempt at appearance rather than usability.

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* “I’m generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‘Concentrate on your body’” - New York Times

* “In the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses” - Mashable

* “Eliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal” - Tech Republic

* “Found myself similarly refreshed afterwards” - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

comments: I love the app's content, but find certain aspects of the UI to be frustrating. Definitely needs a search function and I can't understand why this hasn't already been resolved. It is hard to find the things I know I've saved and they seem to disappear completely at times. This leads me to be more anxious and frustrated as I sometimes search for ages for a specific story, meditation, or class and then ultimately give up using the app or just pick something that I can't fully delve into.

This is one of the most well-done and educational apps I have come across, and I have been so helped by the guidance and the less guidance etc variety of selections they have. Do yourself a favor and get it. I want to give it a five; however, the user interface could be organized a bit better and there are sometimes (often enough to be stressful) glitches in audio cutting out. It would be great to not only have fav meditations but also be able to organize a "my library" of fav series w/ folders

Okay so...the contents of the app are great. I've found it very useful for me in managing anxiety in these crazy Covid-19 times. But...the organization, lack of search, and ineffective favoriting method are beginning to make me look elsewhere. Around a month ago I had emailed help or support with some suggestions but they were "taken under consideration", which we all know what that means. Please fix this. Tamara's amazing, but not THAT amazing.

Beautiful sounds and songs. However you're locked out of almost all meaningful guided meditations, or relaxing stories unless you pay a subscription. The music is beautiful and I used it frequently, I just feel there's plenty of apps I can get the same from, for free. If this offered more free options then I might change my opinion, and rating.

I tried to use this along with primed mind and I was severely disappointed. The Lebron mental fitness is quite great but it's not content you can listen to over and over again as meditation. Developers, please listen to primed mind for an example of what guided meditation is. Great idea, terrible execution. Additionally, the navigation is not intuitive! Quite frankly frustrating for first time users such as myself. I was really hoping this would have some useful content that are not on primed

title: First Help
description: This health related app developed by Dhulikhel Hospital in collaboration with University of Houston Computer Science Department, Kathmandu University Department of Computer Science and Engineering and KEIV Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is intended for basic informational purposes only. It is not intended as a medical advice or a substitute for a doctor nor for diagnosing or treating health problems. Please consult your doctor immediately if you are suffering from a health issues and before making any health related decision. Although we have made every effort to ensure that the material within this app is accurate and timely, it is provided for the convenience of the users and should not be considered official. Again, we strongly advise you to consult your doctor immediately if you are suffering from any medical condition.

title: Daddy's Little Helper - Messy Home Fun Adventure
description:
Usually your parents take care of you… but now you get to take care of your daddy! Silly Daddy can't get anything right! Help Daddy clean up & organize the messy house! House cleaning can really be fun, we promise! Be the best little helper around with tons of fun-filled & engaging home activities! Wash dirty dishes, prepare dinner, iron the laundry, tidy up the living room and more! It’s time to take care of Daddy!

Uh oh, this house is a mess! Time for some serious house cleaning! Can you take care of Daddy & help organize the house before Mommy comes home? Do the laundry, take care of the puppy, clean the messy toilet & more! Don’t forget to leave Mommy a loving note on the fridge! Helping around the house is pretty crazy (especially when Mommy's not home!), but house cleaning with Daddy is also so fun!

Features: 
> House cleaning time! Wash the dirty dishes in soapy water & put them away on the dishrack. 
> Bake & decorate yummy cookies in the kitchen! 
> Clean out the messy fridge & put the groceries away with Daddy! 
> Take care of your messy pet - feed him & make sure he doesn’t have lice!
> Decorate the fridge with magnets - leave a note for Mommy!
> Help Daddy iron the wrinkly clothes, fold them & put them away!  
> Decorate your robot & send it off to clean the messy living room! 
> Set the table with beautiful dishes for dinner! Show everyone how much you care!

comments: It's interesting. My little girl enjoyed it. Just that the ads were too many and irritated her.
It took forever to install and its working sooo bad. But its a fun game for kids!

Oh oh it is fantastic. I always like tab tale games and this is the best of them. Please, please download it and rate it as good as you can. It is really awesome. It's awesome, fantastic, cool, good, nice and suitable for kids. I am like a fan of this game. IT IS MY REQUEST TO DOWNLOAD THIS AWESOME GAME. PLEASE.
I love it. But there is one thing I don't like about it. It's all the god dang adds! But overall I love it and I think you should get it and love it too.😃

This is a great game! I am a kid in the recommended age range and this game is fun! Almost everything is free and i had so much fun! Wow i repeated the same thing twice i am so dumb. Now back on topic. I recommend this for kid who need to learn how to be helpful.

title: Relish - Relationship Personal Trainer & Advice
description:
Relish is the #1 Training App for your Relationship. Join the thousands already experiencing a better connection, more affection and more intimacy with our:

*Customized lesson plans 
*Unlimited 1-on-1 coaching with a qualified relationship coach. 
*Interactive quizzes 
*Tailored activities for individuals or couples 

Relish comes recommended by relationship counsellors and marriage therapists.

Relish can be used by individuals or couples and can be used alongside therapy or as a maintenance tool to keep your relationship fresh. Each week you get a new lesson plan covering the exact topics that *you* need to focus on. We check-in with you weekly and you can reach out to your coach via text message any time for extra advice.

Relish selects the right lessons for you from the following topics:

*Managing Emotions
*Communicating
*Rebuilding Trust
*Fun & Friendship
*Sex & Affection
*Self-awareness
*Partner-awareness
*Listening
*Supporting Each Other
*Feeling Secure
*Family Life
*Being Grateful
*Opening Up
*Complimenting

You’ll also get:

*Deep insights into your relationship dynamic
*Understanding of how your attachment style impacts your relationship
*Journaling capability
*Affordable and fun date night ideas
*Deeper dives into the science behind the advice
*Progress tracking
*Support from our caring community

Work through Relish at your own pace - together or alone. Start Relishing today!

Please note: Relish and the materials and information contained herein are not intended to, and do not constitute, medical, psychological, or mental health advice, or diagnosis, and may not be used for such purposes. You should always consult with a qualified physician or mental health professional about your specific circumstances. Relish and its affiliates disclaim any and all liability from the use of any information or advice from anything contained in our app, website, or services.

recentChanges: We've squashed some bugs and made it easier to connect with your partner on Relish!
comments: I usually do not go out of my way to write reviews but I felt I had to with this app. This is by far the best relationship help app I have found! And I'm only on the free trial. With that being said it is also the cheapest I have found after the free trial!

I didn't purchase subscription because the free portion wasn't helpful at all. It asked me to ask my husband "what did you dream of last night?" He responded "nothing." Definitely not going to work for us.
App crashes when I try to start the quiz so I'm pretty much stuck. Other than that, the lessons are interesting and could possibly help your relationship.

Trial period is too short to be able to know if worth paying for especially with limited lessons. Either have limited lessons for free for each week (1-2 are perfectly fine) or extend the trial period to 30 days with more access.

Only free for 7days then $14.99 a month. The intro questions about the relationship are very limited to married couples that live together and share children. What about long distance relationships, and mixed families? Doesnt specify if your spouse can see your answers or not. Wish it gave a tour of how it works.

title: Saving Your Relationship
description:
Even the happiest relationships go through troubled periods. Life is so full of change
and uncertainties and these can certainly put relationships to the test.

This guide aims to help people who are facing difficulties within their relationship
and need help with how to get things back on track. You may be considering if you
even want to stay in the relationship at all. This Saving Your Relationship app will help you consider your options and think everything through before walking away. Some of the ideas and techniques may even help you with other relationships in your life that you may have difficulties with – perhaps with a friend, parent, sibling or other relative.

Included in this awesome Saving Your Relationship app is: 
* How to save your relationship
* Unrealistic Expectations 
* Putting the past to rest
* What you need to do next
* Communication
* Invest time and effort
* When it's time to let go
* and much much more...

If you are having trouble in your relationship with your friends, family or loved ones, now is the time to download this app and start learning ways on how to improve your relationship with those people. 

Download your free Saving Your Relationship app today and start improving the relationships in your life.

recentChanges: This is the newest release of Saving Your Relationship.
comments: This app has compiled advice that is easy to follow without fail. (As long as you don't believe everything will work out positively in your favor by following it step-by-step. These are guidelines. Keys to help you open the locked door of the proverbial, "Forbidden and Taboo Box of Pandora", that is your relationship problems. Bottom Line: -When you want to make it work but don't know where to start or who to turn to,... This app is a very good start.

Awful!! I get notifications but they are incomplete! Then I click on it and when it goes to the sight there is just a table of contents with no indication as to where the rest of the remark is!! Very frustrating!

App put MALWARE on my Galaxy S9 Right after installing several apps my phone got several notifications of explicit nature. Then my phone started dropping calls & sucking battery. I took it in to my Carrier. I was told my phone had Malware installed. How? This app put Malware on my phone. They found it, deleted it & uninstalled this app. Be careful, now I know not every app in Google play store is safe! Just look at developer's email address, says it all
Really good information if you are having trouble in your relationship! I like how its broken down into simple, realistic goals or steps so it seems doable!

It's very good information, I applied it to what I thought was a 17 year lost relationship and I'm happy to say things are improving very well. Thanks so much for creating such a wonderful app, if folks do the work, it will work.

title: Migraine Relief Hypnosis - Headache & Pain Help
description:
◎ A single audio session of 30 minutes a day that is effective* in just 1–3 weeks
◎ Hypnosis audio carefully read by the soothing voice of a certified hypnotherapist
◎ Peaceful background music and nature sounds to help you relax
◎ Hypnotic Booster with binaural beats to induce your brainwave frequency into an optimal state for receiving hypnotic suggestions
◎ Separate volume controls for Voice, Background, and Hypnotic Booster
◎ Awaken at End feature can be disabled at bedtime for a relaxing, restful sleep

comments: I like having different options with regards to sounds and lengths of run time. I love the music and calming voice. Very well made app!
Most if not all of settings are "Pay for Play" only. The need to listen to someone speak just pissed me off more!
Does not provide migraine relief. You listen to someone talking the entire time causing more pain. Waste of money.
I am a Chronic Migraine sufferer, and this app is definitely one of my go to's when I am suffering from a migraine. Thank you!

As a chronic migraine sufferer, I downloaded this app out of curiosity as a trial 2-3yrs ago... within a month I paid for the full version & I have no regrets on this purchase. The lady's optional voice is very soothing, calm & gentle- the options for the background music/ noise are amazing. This app is AMAZING & helps beyond any pills!!! Highly recommended!!!

title: Vent - Express yourself freely
description:
Vent is like a social diary, a place for you to express how you REALLY feel.  

Vent helps you connect to a fun, uplifting, positive, and understanding community, making it easy to share your feelings with people around the world and lift your mood! 

On Vent, you’re never alone. Our whole community is just waiting to hear what you have to say.  Join now and discover how much you have in common with… well, everybody!

-  Express your true self with our broad range of emotions and colors!
-  React to other people’s vents using our special response buttons
-  Our community understands what you’re going through and will provide support 24/7
-  Make friends and chat privately in real-time without sharing personal contact information
-  Join Groups to connect with other people that share similar interests and experiences 

What are you waiting for? Express yourself with Vent now and feel better for it!

comments: My favorite app, but frequent bugs. :( Right now, I cannot interact with others posts or even my own. I can make a vent post in itself, but cannot react to others vents or leave comments. It's been going on for a few days now, and there's no update I am waiting for 😭please fix, I would love to rate this app 5☆ it is my favorite app. It just goes through so many bugs!!

Great app, seriously helped me with serious issues I had built up, but I want to say that I had vent on my old phone but when i got my new phone I had to make a new account but when I put in my Gmail name it said that it was already registered so I can't post on my new account so it's pretty much useless :/
friendly community, tons of emotions to pick from(and a ton of free ones each month so you don't need to pay £2.99 for all of them per month)

Been loving this app and using it religiously, however i recently updated it a few days ago and now it won't open... just shows a screen saying loading :/ i don't want to have to create a whole new account just because I updated the app

I absolutely love this app. I've had it for almost three years now. It's really helped me out at a time I literally needed to vent. It's really easy to figure out when you first start off. & if you have a question about the app, there are always kind people to answer. The community is great. It's a great way to relate to others & get support & advice. I do miss being able to use kin for the other emotions though. Sometimes I feel like some of my vents don't really fit some of the emotions.
